oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Experimental farm Nagele
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Vegetables
Root crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The unit consists of four farming systems: - Bio-dynamic system with arable crops and field vegetables representing the organic farms in the northern and central clay areas of The Netherlands (22 ha) - Bio-intensive system with field vegetables, representing the smaller organic farms (12 ha) - Bio-diverse system with optimal use of biodiversity to control diseases and plagues. (12 ha) - Integrated system with arable crops representing the conventional farms in the northern and central clay areas (24 ha)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} Nagele: Experimental farm Nagele. Facility Leader(s): unknown, , Wageningen University and Research Centre.
